title: Gauging Growth In Michigan
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Gage is a cannabis operator solely focused on the Michigan market, which is the third largest state in terms of cannabis consumption. CEO Fabian Monaco joins the show to discuss learning from those that came before him, getting investment insight from Bruce Linton, Jason Wild and Tim Seymour and following Trulieve's example. Gage's exclusive partnership with Cookies, plans for expansion and thoughts on developing legal picture. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
